sentences.en: And his coat was adorned with a flamboyant bunch of flowers.
sentences.cn: 他的外套上面装饰着一束艳丽刺目的鲜花.

sentences.en: But Berlin's most flamboyant annual get - together still draws the crowds.
sentences.cn: 但柏林一年一度的盛会仍显示了其绚丽多姿的面貌吸引了大批参加者.

sentences.en: Critics attack his lavish spending and flamboyant style.
sentences.cn: 评论家抨击他大肆挥霍、恣意张扬的作风。

sentences.en: Freddie Mercury was a flamboyant star of the British hard rock scene.
sentences.cn: 弗雷迪·摩克瑞是英国硬摇滚乐界一颗耀眼的明星。

sentences.en: Guzm á n also has something of a taste for the flamboyant.
sentences.cn: 某种程度上,古兹曼也有炫耀的喜好.

sentences.en: He lifted his arms in a flamboyant gesture .
sentences.cn: 他抬起胳膊，做了个炫耀的手势。

sentences.en: He wears flamboyant clothes more suited to a rock star than a literary figure.
sentences.cn: 他总是身穿那些与他作家身份不搭、倒更适合摇滚明星的时髦招摇的衣服。

sentences.en: His clothes were rather flamboyant for such a serious occasion.
sentences.cn: 他的衣着在这种严肃场合太浮夸了.

sentences.en: His style of choreography is flamboyant.
sentences.cn: 他的舞蹈设计风格是复杂夸张的.

sentences.en: If you want to buy a flamboyant pair of trousers, go ahead!
sentences.cn: 如果你想要买一条派头十足的裤子, 去吧!

sentences.en: Pierpont Morgan , perhaps the most flamboyant of the enterpreneurs , operated on a scale of magnificence.
sentences.cn: 皮尔庞特·摩根或许是企业家当中最阔气的.他的经营规模庞大.

sentences.en: Pierpont Morgan , perhaps the most flamboyant of the entrepreneurs , operated on a scale of magnificence.
sentences.cn: 皮尔庞特?摩根或许是企业家当中最阔气的.他的经营规模庞大.

sentences.en: She has red hair and a rather flamboyant appearance.
sentences.cn: 她一头红发，外表相当艳丽。

sentences.en: The flamboyant slippers might also have dubious fashion value today.
sentences.cn: 当然,这双“珠光宝气”的拖鞋即使在今天可能也不会过时.

sentences.en: Thereafter the colours she chose to wear remained bright and flamboyant.
sentences.cn: 自此以后,她选择的衣服都相当艳丽.

sentences.en: This flamboyant and aggressive group of artists put more importance on manifestos than any other.
sentences.cn: 这伙花哨、活跃的艺术家比其他任何画派都更重视宣言.

trans.tran_cn: 艳丽的，火焰似的，过分华丽的
